recipesJson.name: Moist Macaroon
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: Just a nice sweet Moist Macaroon Cookie. The recipe taste good off the shake but give it 3-5 days for the flavors to meld together to get that nice crispy taste. For me the Supersweet makes the cookie just a bit more vibrant and brings a much needed sweetness that I like. Mixed at 69/31. The vanilla pudding and vanilla bean combined with the cream and condensed milk make this cookie nice and moist . Hence the name.
